TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_planks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 10}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 29, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 56, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 55, "index": 17}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 12, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 37, "index": 24}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 40, "index": 26}, {"type": "piglin_brute_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 31}, {"type": "written_book", "quantity": 5, "index": 34}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 20, "index": 36}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "cyan_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "honeycomb_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft dark_oak_planks, I need to move the stripped_dark_oak_wood from slot 16 to the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_planks
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 10}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 29, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 56, "index": 15}, {"type": "sugar", "quantity": 55, "index": 17}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 12, "index": 21}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 37, "index": 24}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 40, "index": 26}, {"type": "piglin_brute_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 31}, {"type": "written_book", "quantity": 5, "index": 34}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 20, "index": 36}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 48, "index": 38}, {"type": "cyan_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "honeycomb_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that the dark_oak_planks have been crafted, I need to move them from the crafting grid to an empty inventory slot (eg., 13).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4
